mapper.select: SELECT state FROM favstore WHERE favs_c_id = #{userId} AND favs_s_id = #{storeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favstore (favs_c_id, favs_s_id, state) VALUES (#{userId}, #{storeId}, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favstore WHERE favs_c_id = #{userId} AND favs_s_id = #{storeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE favstore SET state = #{state} WHERE favs_c_id = #{userId} AND favs_s_id = #{storeId}
mapper.select: SELECT sf_sysname FROM ( SELECT sf_sysname, favs_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY favs_date DESC) as rnum FROM Seller_File sf JOIN FavStore fs ON sf.sf_s_id = fs.favs_s_id WHERE fs.favs_c_id = #{c_id} ) WHERE rnum = 1
